description.narrative: The project strives to guarantee multicultural education for Toba native people?s children for bettering literacy and also to maintain alive their native language. This project is a second part of a project program started with the funds from the local coo peration fund in 2008. The purpose is to solidify the results and comprehensively improve the multicultural education among the Toba children. The project is supported by various civil organizations, the local community and teachers, and the Ministry of Ed ucation of Chaco. In general the situation of Toba people is complicated and challenging. Chaco is one of the poorest provinces in Argentina, where all the general development indicators are of the lowest in the country. The project aims to enhance the pos sibilities of Toba children in the long run by ensuring their education and rights and reducing poverty.
